item.title: French PM backs freezing Macron's pension reform to save government
item.description: The changes, which raised the retirement age from 62 to 64, were seen as signature reforms in Emmanuel Macron's presidency.

item.title: National strike hits Belgian public transport, airports and ships
item.description: Tens of thousands of people take to the streets in Brussels over government reforms and spending cuts.

item.title: What happens next in Trump's ceasefire plan?
item.description: All living Israeli hostages have returned home and a ceasefire is in place. What happens next in Gaza?

item.title: How Milei's 'Thatcherite' economics divided his nation - but won over Trump

item.title: Cuban dissident begins US exile after release from jail
item.description: The outspoken critic of the Cuban government was released from jail after a request by the US.
